cause.description:
The League accomplishes its mission by:
* Providing appropriate shelter and humane care for homeless animals
* Reducing pet overpopulation through strict spay/neuter measures
* Seeking permanent, responsible homes for adoptable pets
* Providing a diversity of humane education programs to meet community needs
1. The League has been dedicated to the care and welfare of animals and humane education for more than 90 years.
2. We are an open admissions shelter taking in any animal at any time.
3. We spay and neuter all our dogs and cats and offer those services to the community as well.
cause.mission: The League’s mission is to provide for the rescue and relief of suffering of homeless animals and perform charitable or benevolent acts for the welfare of animals.
cause.name: Providence Animal Rescue League
